title: Channel Islands National Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Watch the park film: Treasure in the Sea               Learn about wildlife in the park.               Gateway to the Past: Park history and culture.               View the park webcams.         Â            News   Browse press releases, read the park newspaper, and contact public affairs.        Photos and Multimedia   View our park film, webcams, photo galleries, virtual tours, and videos.        History and Culture   Learn about the park's 13,000 years of human history.              Nature   Learn about the park's wildlife, plantlife, environment, ecosystems, and wildland fire.        Education   Learn about distance learning, Parks as Classrooms, and professional development opportunities.        Kids and Youth   Become a Junior Ranger.              Management   View staff and office listings, park statistics, and laws and policies.        Publications   View and download the park brochure, newspaper, hiking maps, and trail guides.        Bookstore   Visit the Western National Park's Association bookstore to purchase items from the park.
